thread.title: TLS Energy Savers Helps Florida Homeowners Beat the Heat with Smarter Insulation Solutions
thread.title_full: TLS Energy Savers Helps Florida Homeowners Beat the Heat with Smarter Insulation Solutions

author: Inyo Register
title: TLS Energy Savers Helps Florida Homeowners Beat the Heat with Smarter Insulation Solutions
text:
TAMPA, FL - Apr 23, 2025 - As Florida continues to experience rising temperatures and higher energy demands, one local company is stepping up with practical solutions for homeowners: TLS Energy Savers, an insulation service provider based in Central Florida, is helping families stay cooler and save money through advanced, professionally installed insulation systems.
Operating across counties like Hillsborough, Pinellas, Polk, Orange, Pasco, and Manatee, TLS Energy Savers has become a go-to name for reliable insulation services in cities such as Tampa, Lakeland, St. Petersburg, Winter Haven, Orlando, and Bradenton.
Unlike national franchises, TLS Energy Savers is deeply rooted in the local community, offering customized recommendations based on Florida’s climate patterns, housing types, and utility structures. The company provides a range of services including:
Blown-in fiberglass insulation to help attics retain cool air and reduce AC strain
Spray foam insulation for homes and attics, offering airtight sealing and superior energy efficiency
Attic insulation services, whether for new installations or upgrades in older homes
Insulation removal and replacement for damaged, outdated, or pest-infested materials
Duct sealing services to stop hidden air leaks and improve HVAC system performance
Wall and ceiling insulation to improve indoor temperature consistency year-round
We see a lot of homeowners in places like Plant City, Wesley Chapel, and Kissimmee who are frustrated with high energy bills despite running the AC constantly,” said Seth Hoerig, founder of TLS Energy Savers. “Often, the problem isn’t the HVAC system — it’s the lack of insulation.”
What sets TLS Energy Savers apart is not just what they install, but how they operate. The company is a preferred contractor for major utility providers like Duke Energy, FPL, Lakeland Electric, and TECO, allowing eligible homeowners to access energy-saving rebates that other contractors can’t offer.
Customers also appreciate the company’s streamlined communication, with real-time updates via texts and emails throughout the project. Every technician is formally trained, drug-tested, and background-checked, giving homeowners peace of mind when work is being done inside their homes.
From older homes in Bartow needing retrofitted attic insulation to newly constructed houses in Riverview seeking garage door upgrades, TLS Energy Savers approaches each project with precision and care.
“Insulation isn’t just about comfort. It’s about protecting your home, lowering your energy footprint, and making a smart investment for the long term,” said Seth Hoerig.
As Florida braces for another long summer, TLS Energy Savers remains committed to helping homeowners stay ahead of the heat — one attic, wall, and garage door at a time.
About TLS Energy Savers
TLS Energy Savers is a locally owned and operated insulation company serving residential properties throughout Central Florida. With hundreds of verified 5-star Google reviews, partnerships with Florida utility companies, and a track record of professionalism and technical expertise, TLS continues to lead the way in energy-efficient home solutions.
